title: France panorama. [No. 68/35]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The international sand castle contest on the beach at La Baule - summer vacationists in the Atlantic seaside resort of La Baule witenes the traditional annual contest between builders of sand castles and sculptures. 2. Inauguration of the new pleasure-craft port of Saint-Raphael - pleasure-craft sailing in France becomes evermore popular. 3. French track athletes prepare for the Olympics - the French national track championships give us a preview of what French athletes may expect to achieve in the coming summer Olympic Games at Mexico City. 4. About an annual fesitval: Avignon - the theatre, motion pictures, the dance, and music all featured at the annual Avignon Art Festival.
